parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Index of the page to return when the responses are paginated.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: No. of entries to return in a page when responses are paginated.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Name of the property by which the responses will be sorted.

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Ascending or descending order in which the responses will be sorted.

parameter.name: patientId
parameter.description: ID of the patient whose specific medical alerts would be retrieved.

parameter.name: deleted
parameter.description: Indicate whether to retrieve only the deleted medical alerts or not.
